## Course Description

Mass transfer fundamentals with emphasis on diffusion, convection, theories of molecular diffusion coefficients, phase equilibria,
and applications to separations and
reactor/transport problems. 

Topics include:

1) molecular diffusion and convection
2) theoretical background of mass transfer coefficients
3) interphase mass transfer, boundary layers
4) analogies with
heat/momentum transfer
5) introductory design calculations for
separation processes.
